entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content:
Please note that on page 23, "12. Appendix B: LDAP Schema" we propose to publish the LDAP schema at http://schemas.ogf.org/glue/2014/07/GLUE20_LDAP.schema.

    This is the schema we wish to publish to this URL: http://redmine.ogf.org/dmsf_files/13290?download=

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content:
• Status changed from submitted to initial review
  • Assignee set to Andre Merzky

Dear John-Paul et al.,

Thanks for this submission. I have performed the initial Editor review, and am now submitting it for steering group review prior to 60-day public comment. I appreciate your group's efforts for this important submission.

I noted your request for publishing the schema. This is no problem to accompany the publication. It is part of our standard procedure to do so. Greg Newby

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content: Needs update of IPR.

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content:
• Status changed from initial review to public comment

Authors/editors: After updating the copyright notice (via Andre), this will go to 60-day public comment. At that time, please enlist your constituency to read & provide comments. Thanks, Greg Newby

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content:
• File ogf-glue-2-to-LDAP-v7.3-draft5.doc added
  • File ogf-glue-2-to-LDAP-v7.3-draft5.pdf added

update IPR

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content:
• Assignee changed from Andre Merzky to Greg Newby

The public comment tracker is created at http://redmine.ogf.org/projects/editor-pubcom/boards/22, and can be announced.

Thanks, Andre.

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content:
• Status changed from public comment to author action

Document has completed its public comment period. Group and area director should advise as to whether the document is ready to proceed to final review.

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content:
Could you please give us the GFD number we will receive so that we can add pointers to it in our final schema?

    http://www.ogf.org/documents/GFD.<NNN>.pdf

    Thanks,

    JP

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content:
Dear John-Paul:

    Certainly. When published this will be GFD-RP.218. We're looking forward to the final version.
    - Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content: Awaiting action by the group - Note there remains editing markup in the document. Please let us know when you re ready to bring this up for final review.

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content:
• Assignee changed from Greg Newby to John-Paul Navarro

This should have been reassigned to JP when Greg completed his GFD number assignment. This document is in author action until we hear back from the group as to whether they have completed any needed revisions and are ready for GFSG final review.

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content:
Greg.

    What are the final changes we need to make to this document before we submit it for GFSG final review, besides:

    • Set document name to GFD-RP.218
    • Category: Change from "Recommendation" to what value?
    • Accept any tracked changes and make minor spelling corrections
    • Set document date to what?

    Who can post the final schema for us to here?
    - http://schemas.ogf.org/glue/2014/07/GLUE20_LDAP.schema

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content:
Dear JP:

    Thanks for following up. The standards council meeting schedule is somewhat variable, currently. Therefore, my suggestion is to leave the date as TBD, but otherwise to provide the final version that is ready their review prior to publication.

    Once the standards council approves, there might still be minor changes... either way, you can then generate the final version for publication, with the date of approval.

    Then, Andre will put the final document, as well as the schema, online. If there is a reason to have the schema there earlier, we can email him separately - no problem either way.

    Thanks again. We're looking forward to seeing this document published! Thanks to you, and the team, for great work to get it this far.
    - Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content:
• File GFD-RP.218-rc1.doc added
  • File GFD-RP.218-rc1.pdf added
  • File GLUE20_LDAP.schema added

Attached please find the GLUE Working Group's final GFD-RP.218 document and associated schema for standards council review and final publication.

The schema will need to be published here:
http://schemas.ogf.org/glue/2014/07/GLUE20_LDAP.schema

Thanks,

JP Navarro

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content: This is in standards council final review, prior to publishing the document & schema.

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content: • Assignee changed from John-Paul Navarro to Greg Newby

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content:
• Status changed from author action to AD review
  • Assignee changed from Greg Newby to Andre Merzky

Per the standards council meeting December 8, we are checking with the AD (Andre) that they are deemed ready for publication.
- Greg

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content: Checking with Andre on status.

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content:
Greg/Andre,

    Will we get published soon?

    Thanks,

    JP

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content: Sorry for the delay, JP. I have pinged Andre & the standards council via email.

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content: This document (and the schema) has finally been published

entry.title: Editor - document #242: GLUE v. 2.0 – Reference Realisation to LDAP Schema
entry.content:
• Status changed from AD review to closed

This is now GFD.218 (http://www.ogf.org/documents/GFD.218.pdf)
